sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaCheck, FaThumbsDown, FaThumbsUp } from "react-icons/fa"; import { BiX } from 'react-icons/bi' import WatchBtn from "../WatchBtn"; export default function MovieInfo({ movie }) { console.log(movie) let firstDate = new Date(movie.first_air_date); function closeMovieInfo(){ const moreInfo = document.querySelector('.movieInfo') moreInfo.classList.add('close') } return (

{movie.original_title}{movie.name}

{movie.vote_average.substring(0, 200)} {firstDate.getFullYear()}

{movie.overview}

) }
